meanings.definition: The action or process of creating plays or strategies in a game or sport.
meanings.sent1: Her playmaking on the field led to many successful goals for the team.
meanings.sent2: The coach praised her playmaking abilities during the match.
meanings.sent3: The playmaking of the team captain was so impressive that it caught the attention of scouts.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, strategic playmaking can determine the outcome of the match.
meanings.sent5: His playmaking was like a well-choreographed dance, each move deliberate and effective.

meanings.definition: The ability or skill to create opportunities for scoring or success in a game or sport.
meanings.sent1: His natural playmaking made him a valuable asset to the team.
meanings.sent2: The player's playmaking was evident in how he set up his teammates for scoring chances.
meanings.sent3: The playmaking of the young athlete was so exceptional that it caught the eye of professional scouts.
meanings.sent4: Her playmaking was like a magic wand, turning every play into a scoring opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The coach emphasized the importance of playmaking in creating winning opportunities on the field.
